description: This script provides example demonstrations of a bear movement detection system, including mock data creation for scenarios with stationary and moving camera setups, analysis, and reporting. It also contains an interactive menu for testing different scenarios and configuration display.

classes.name: BoundingBox
classes.description: Represents a detected bounding box around an object in a video frame, with methods to compute its center and distance to another bounding box.

classes.name: FrameDetection
classes.description: Encapsulates detection data for a single video frame, including timestamp, detected bears, static objects, and frame metadata.

methods.name: create_mock_frame_data
methods.description: Creates a sequence of frames with simulated bear movement scenarios for demonstration.

methods.name: create_moving_camera_frame_data
methods.description: Creates a sequence of frames simulating a moving camera observing a stationary bear, testing motion detection robustness.

methods.name: test_moving_camera_scenario
methods.description: Runs a test scenario with mock data representing camera panning while the bear is stationary, analyzing the detection logic.

methods.name: analyze_moving_camera_results
methods.description: Evaluates the results of the moving camera test to assess if the detection algorithm correctly distinguishes camera motion from actual bear movement.

methods.name: demonstrate_movement_detection
methods.description: Runs a demo of the bear movement detection system with mock data, illustrating detection outputs and database storage.

methods.name: run_test_menu
methods.description: Provides an interactive command-line menu to select and run different test scenarios or display configuration.

methods.name: show_help
methods.description: Displays usage instructions and command-line options for the script.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Main entry point that handles command-line arguments or launches the interactive menu.
